143.content: Tails decided to grow to 50ft. He then said "Whoa! Everything is so small to me!" Tails then decided to take a walk. While Tails was walking around he stopped for a look around. Then Sonic came. He saw two red and white things. Then he looked up,and saw Tails. Tails noticed Sonic,and said,followed by a smirk "Well Sonic,who's the bigger friend now,eh?" Sonic looked at him,and in fear,said "W-what the heck??!?! Tails,why are you so big?" Tails picked him up,and said "I was working on an invention,when suddenly,an accident left me with strange powers. I'm able to change my size!" Sonic was surprised. Then Tails' belly growled. Tails then said "I'm hungry. I guess after working on that machine for so long would make me hungry." Sonic,of course,began trembling in fear. Tails then remembered that he has Sonic,and thought "Hmm,maybe i should just eat him." Sonic felt that Tails might eat him,and,in fear said "W-w-w-wait a moment,T-t-tails. I-i can buy you some f-food and e-enlarge it for you with one of your g-growth rays." Tails then said "Hmm,sounds like a good idea." Then he thought weather to eat Sonic,or let him buy some food and enlarge it. After a while he made a decision.
143.title: 50ft tall Tails

1431.content: Tails looked at Sonic,and smirked. Sonic began trembling in fear and thought "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!" Tails then opened his mouth,and dangled Sonic over it. Sonic then thought "Why......" Then Tails dropped Sonic in his mouth,and started sloshing him around for about 5 seconds. Afterwards,he swallowed him. Sonic was falling down the throat,and then landed in the stomach. Tails patted his belly and went on. Then he thought of what to do next.
1431.title: Eat him.

info.brief_description: Tails finds out he can grow any part of his body. AND ITS BACK!
info.description:
This is not my story. I enjoyed it, and was disappointed to see it go. But now I've brought it back to life!

no number 2. pee and cum is ok, but not number 2.
Cock vore is allowed and if he does, his cock grows larger. and always give that option ok?
sonic and any girl can join on the growing.
preferably Tails cannot go killing off main characters, but If you really want to, I won't stop it.
swearing is allowed. just don't overuse it.
good grammar please. not many like a sloppy story. myself included.
no getting fat. I for one, despise inflation, weight gain, all that stuff.
no foot or muscle growth either!
I know the very beginning is 3rd person. but from there on out, keep it 1st ok?
no ridiculous numbers. I don't want 1000000000000000000000000000 ft or anything like that. If they get that big, compare it to something. (EX. 5 Earths could fit in his cock.) and no metric system either!
no short chapters, unless its "how big" or something like that.
no ending.
